powers.name: Higan
powers.description: Creates a small fire punch that will cause a little damage on impact.

powers.name: Shinka: Shiranui
powers.description: Creates small fire punches that will cause damage on impact and set fire to everything they touch. When they collide with a block they explode.

powers.name: Hiken
powers.description: A powerful focused fire beam will be created that will damage everything that comes across it.

powers.name: Dai Enkai: Entei
powers.description: It will create a huge fireball above player that will spawn small fireballs that will move to the location player is looking. Small explosions occur on impact.
